metadata.description: A veteran bounty hunter in the Old West on his way to deliver a dead bounty happens to come across a woman and her son on their way to California. The bounty decides to ride with them as they are being threatened by bandits who are hoping to take their land claim. Additional tale of an Indian scout for the US Cavalry who, while serving for the army, returns to find his village has been wiped out by renegade soldiers.
metadata.name: Bounty and Navarro: Tales of the Old West
